member.name: M:BasicRestApi.API.Controllers.BouquetController.GetAllBouquetsForShop(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets you a list of all the bouquets inside a shop. If the shop does not exist, you get a 404. An empty list means "no bouquets available".
member.param: The unique identifier of the shop

member.name: M:BasicRestApi.API.Controllers.BouquetController.GetBouquetFromShop(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets you a specific bouquet in a shop. A 404 means that the shop with said id does not exists.
member.param: The unique identifier of the shop
The unique identifier of the bouquet

member.name: M:BasicRestApi.API.Controllers.BouquetController.AddBouquetToShop(System.Int32,BasicRestApi.API.Models.Web.BouquetUpsertInput)
member.summary: Creates a new bouquet inside a shop. A 404 means that the shop with said id does not exist.
member.param: The unique identifier of the shop
